context_bundle.summary: Windows MCP send_keys tool execution failure. Root cause: PowerShell SendKeys unreliable for window targeting. Solution: Use AutoHotkey v2.0 scripts instead.

onboarding.quick_start: Error: 'Tool execution failed' when calling send_keys. Fix: Create AHK script instead. Pattern in T96WMCP_AHK_INTEGRATION.
common_patterns: Symptom: No error details, silent failure
Root cause: PowerShell SendKeys window focus race conditions
Solution: write_file + execute_powershell with AHK script
known_errors: send_keys fails on VS Code windows
